H0.text: what timezone is utah in. Pacific Time Zone

H1.text: what timezone is utah in. Central Time Zone

H2.text: what timezone is utah in. Eastern Time Zone

H3.text: what timezone is utah in. Mountain Time Zone

A4.text: Six states are fully contained in the Mountain Time Zone: Colorado, Montana, New Mexico, Utah, Wyoming

A5.text: The following states have an offset equal to Mountain Daylight Time: United States... Arizona (does not use daylight saving time except for Navajo Nation)
